Testcase

The faq states that the issue "Page numbers are not properly right aligned" should be fixed [1], but I have a test case where the problem still occurs.

Any ideas on how to fix this?

I suggest to update the FAQ in the meanwhile...

Regards,
Matthias Reischenbacher

[1] http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/faq.html#page-number-align
